title: How to Make Bird Puppets from Plastic Straws

steps.headline: Start with two straws per puppet.
steps.description: It's also possible to make a puppet from a single straw, but the "handle" will be shorter.

steps.headline: Make the body from one straw.Optional: Cut the straw.
steps.description:
Straighten the straw. Observe that it's divided into two sections by the "bendy" part. One section is longer than the other. Cut the longer section halfway between the end and the bend. This is for if you want to make a puppet from just one straw, because you can use the shorter section to make wings later. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/31/DVC00219_583.JPG/460px-DVC00219_583.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/3/31/DVC00219_583.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

TOHGIN minako

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"} {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/90/Puppets-cut2_644.png/460px-Puppets-cut2_644.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/90/Puppets-cut2_644.png/760px-Puppets-cut2_644.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":62,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":102.3076923076923,"licensing":"

TOHGIN minako

Image by: Uploader

"} Press the straw down on either side of the bend to make it flat. "} Cut next to the folded edge as shown in the picture. Cut until you get to the bend. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/27/DVC00231_320.JPG/460px-DVC00231_320.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/2/27/DVC00231_320.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

Stop cutting at the bend. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/20/DVC00234_912.JPG/460px-DVC00234_912.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/2/20/DVC00234_912.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

"} Add small feet for the flying lizard puppet. See the subsection below.

steps.headline: Make different mouths for different creatures.
steps.description: Shown in this image, from top to bottom, are a flying lizard, a bird, and a pterodactyl.

steps.headline: Make the wings.
steps.description:
Alter them slightly, depending on the type of puppet you're making. Shown in this image, from top to bottom, are wings for the bird, pterodactyl (there are forefeet on the wings) and flying lizard (cut like the wings of a bat). Cut a short piece of straw open. This can be the short piece you set aside earlier if you're using a single straw, or it can be cut from the second straw. Cut it lengthwise, keeping your cut as straight as possible. You may want to trace the cut with a marker before cutting. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/aa/DVC00220_264.JPG/460px-DVC00220_264.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/aa/DVC00220_264.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

TOHGIN minako

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"} Place the cut piece on a folded towel and flatten it with a spoon. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a5/DVC00223_489.JPG/460px-DVC00223_489.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a5/DVC00223_489.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

TOHGIN minako

License: Creative Commons

"} Cut symmetrical wings on both sides of the fold. steps.headline: Attach the wings to the body.Take each of the wider pieces below the bend and wrap it around the backbone as shown.
steps.description:
{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/53/DVC00245_255.JPG/460px-DVC00245_255.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/53/DVC00245_255.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

TOHGIN minako

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"} Tighten them equally and symmetrically into a knot. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/09/DVC00246_600.JPG/460px-DVC00246_600.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/0/09/DVC00246_600.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

"} They should finish facing forward, in front of the neck and below the bill. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/DVC00248_425.JPG/460px-DVC00248_425.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/0/03/DVC00248_425.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

"} Loosen the knot and pull a wing through. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b8/DVC00250_863.JPG/460px-DVC00250_863.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/b/b8/DVC00250_863.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

TOHGIN minako

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"} Tighten the knot once again. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/be/DVC00251_211.JPG/460px-DVC00251_211.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/b/be/DVC00251_211.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"

TOHGIN minako

License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Cut the tail differently based on the type of puppet you're making.
Stick the eyes on with a tiny drop of glue.
Shape the tail and the wings to finish!

text:
Start with two straws per puppet. It's also possible to make a puppet from a single straw, but the "handle" will be shorter. Make the body from one straw.Optional: Cut the straw. Straighten the straw. Observe that it's divided into two sections by the "bendy" part. One section is longer than the other. Cut the longer section halfway between the end and the bend. This is for if you want to make a puppet from just one straw, because you can use the shorter section to make wings later. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/31/DVC00219_583.JPG/460px-DVC00219_583.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/3/31/DVC00219_583.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":613,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":1013.3333333333334,"licensing":"
